name: Lucky Pie: Play with your food
name_original: Lucky Pie: Play with your food
description:
Calm your brain and plate your favorite food in this addictive and fun puzzle.
Fill in slices of your all-time loved foods. You’ll need your focus, attention and desire for plating to complete this fun game. Are you lucky enough to plate all the delicious foods ?

Once you get the lucky slice, tap on the right place in the outer open plate to get the slice into place. Get points for every complete plate and the two plates next to it.

You’ll get hooked to complete pizzas, pies, sushi, fruits, deserts and so many other kinds of mouth watering foods. The lucky slice that completes the plate is awaiting you!
Fill in full plates of delicious food by tapping on the open outer circles.

The game features:
- Easy to learn but tough to master tasty food puzzle
- Lucky pieces to complete your plates
- Delicious food puzzles
- Power ups that will help you complete the puzzles
